name: Gerbera
desc: Deploy Gerbera with a straightforward setup to create a powerful UPnP media server. Gerbera allows users to stream and manage their digital media across a variety of devices on a home network.
longDesc:
**What is Gerbera?**

Gerbera is an open-source media server that implements the UPnP (Universal Plug and Play) AV (Audio/Video) protocol. It enables users to share and stream media content across different devices such as smart TVs, game consoles, and mobile devices.

**Key Features:**

- **One-Click Deployment:** Quick installation via Docker, facilitating easy access to media server functionalities.
- **Scalability:** Efficiently manages a large library of media files, suitable for personal collections or community sharing.
- **Privacy:** Keeps media content local, allowing users to maintain full control over their data without relying on cloud services.
- **Plugin Support:** Extend functionality with various plugins to enhance streaming and management capabilities.
- **Web Interface:** Provides an intuitive web-based interface for managing media libraries and settings.
useCases:
- **Home Users:** Stream personal media collections to various devices within the home.
- **Educational Institutions:** Share educational videos and resources within classrooms or departments.
- **Media Enthusiasts:** Organize and manage extensive media libraries with easy access to playback options.
support:
- **Community Forums:** Connect with other users for assistance and discussions through the [Gerbera Forum](https://github.com/gerbera/gerbera).
- **Documentation:** Comprehensive user guides and configuration tips are available at the [Gerbera Documentation](https://docs.gerbera.io/en/stable/).
- **Troubleshooting Help:** Access resources for troubleshooting common issues during setup and operation.

 This template provides an overview of Gerberaâ€™s functionalities, emphasizing its capabilities for effective media management and streaming. For more information, visit the [official Gerbera website](https://gerbera.io/).
